title: Remove Buy Course button from hero section, keep only Explore Courses button and background image

requirements.summary: Remove the 'Buy Course' button from HeroSection component while preserving the 'Explore Courses' button, background image, and all other hero section elements
acceptanceCriteria: 'Buy Course' button is completely removed from the hero section
'Explore Courses' button remains visible and functional
Hero section background image is preserved without changes
Hero section headline and subheadline remain unchanged
Smooth scroll functionality to courses section still works when 'Explore Courses' button is clicked
Component renders correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Remove the 'Buy Course' button and its associated modal trigger logic from the HeroSection component. Locate the button that opens the CoursePackagesModal (likely labeled 'Buy Course' or similar) and remove it from the JSX, keeping only the 'Explore Courses' button that handles smooth scrolling to the courses section. Ensure the remaining button retains its current styling, positioning, and onClick handler for scroll functionality. Do not modify the hero section background image reference (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png), headline, subheadline, or container layout. Remove any state management or handlers related to the removed button (e.g., modal open state) if they are no longer used elsewhere in the component.
